description.p: This shiny coin has the golden face of a woman on one side and a purple face on the other. You can use a bonus action to flip and catch the coin, roll a d20 to determine your flip.

tr.td: Good fortune: You have advantage on your next ability check, attack, or saving throw.
Misfortune: You have disadvantage on your next ability check, attack,or saving throw.

description.p: The coin has 3 charges. Each use of the coin expends 1 charge. The coin regains all expended charges daily at dawn.
The coin of fortune’s effects and luck points (Player’s Handbook pg. 167) cancel each other out.
The coin’s effect(s) end after a day.
